text: Jonas Carney (born February 3, 1971) is an American former professional cyclist. Since retiring from competition he has directed the men's team since its inception in 2007, and the women's team since 2016. ==Major results== ;1988 : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships ;1989 : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships ;1990 : 1st Tour de Gastown ;1992 : 1st Tour of Somerville : 2nd Overall Tour of Michigan : 3rd Overall Miller Superweek ::1st Stage 8 ;1993 : 2nd Overall Fresca Classic ::1st Stages 2 & 14 ;1994 : 1st Tour of Michigan ::1st Stage 1 : 1st Tour of Somerville : 1st Stage 11 Fresca Classic : 1st Stage 3 Tour of Willamette ;1996 : 1st Pueblo : 2nd Criterium, National Road Championships ;1997 : 1st 20px Criterium, National Road Championships : 1st Carolina Cup : 1st Greenville ;1998 : 1st Athens : 1st Greenville : 1st Tour of Nutley : 1st Tour of Somerville : 1st Sommerville : 2nd Criterium, National Road Championships ;1999 : 1st 20px Kilo, National Track Championships : 1st Athens : 1st Chicago : 1st Houston Tour : 1st Santa Rosa Criterium : 1st Shelby ;2000 : 1st 20px Kilo, National Track Championships : 1st Touchstone : 1st Shelby : 1st Tour of Somerville : 2nd Clarendon Cup ;2001 : 1st 20px Team pursuit, National Track Championships (with James Carney, Colby Pearce & Ryan Miller) : 1st Kelly Cup : 1st Baltimore : 1st Centennial : 1st Folsom : 1st Greenville : 1st Winter Games Criterium : 1st North End Classic : 1st Race of the 4th of July : 1st Tucson : 1st Davis : 1st Manhattan Beach GP : 1st Irvine : International Cycling Classic ::1st Stages 1, 4 & 6 ;2002 : 1st Plainview : 1st Tour of Somerville : 1st Stage 3 Valley of the Sun Stage Race : 1st Stage 3 Solano Bicycle Classic ;2003 : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Madison ::1st 20px Points race : 1st Clarendon Cup : 1st Chris Thater Memorial Criterium : 1st Roswell : 1st Cat's Hill Classic : 1st Tour of Somerville : 1st Winfield : 1st Binghamton : 1st Manhattan Beach GP : 1st Greenville : International Cycling Classic ::1st Stages 1 & 15 : 2nd Tour de Nez ;2004 : 1st 20px Criterium, National Road Championships : 1st Overall Cyclefest ::1st Stages 1 & 2 : 1st Tour de Gastown : 1st Stage 16 International
